short_summary: 4 Snowmobiles needed for winter resource enforcement patrolling
description: Supply of 4 Snowmobiles to the Department of Fisheries & Oceans Canada – Conservation & Protection Branch – Fredericton, New Brunswick for the purpose of winter resource enforcement patrolling. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror's who offered on the previous solicitation.

full_summary:
#### Title (Français)
F5204-220289-B - Motoneiges

#### Title (English)
F5204-220289-B - Snowmobiles

#### Tender Information
Reference Number: WS3631691023-doc3726228962
Amendment Number: 1
Solicitation Number: WS3631691023

#### Key Dates
* Publication Date: October 27, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 17, 2022, 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 29, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2022

#### Tender Details
* The solicitation of offers replaces and cancels the previous solicitation, F5204-220289/A, dated September 16, 2022.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to offerors who submitted bids on the previous solicitation.
* The contract involves the supply of four snowmobiles to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada – Conservation & Protection Branch – Fredericton, New Brunswick, for the purpose of winter resource enforcement patrolling.

#### Tender Status
The tender is currently **Expired.** However, the solicitation number remains active.

#### Procurement Details
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Fredericton
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Arseneau, Danny (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Access the Tender
To access the tender, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14480759?extsite=MTQ0ODA3NTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14480759?extsite=MTQ0ODA3NTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Goods and Services
The tender involves the supply of snowmobiles, classified under **25101903** of the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC). -->
